text: The A-Files is a 1998 video game for Windows and Macintoshhttps://www.mobygames.com/game/windows/a-files by Norwegian developer Gyldendal, in collaboration with five book publishers in the Nordic region. The game was "relatively inexpensive" to produce. It was authored by Paul Westlake and Fiona Miller. The game became popular throughout the Nordic countries and was also sold in Germany, Italy and Holland. == Awards == * "The New Media Prize" in Bologna, Italy. * "Best interactive production of the year" in Gullklappan 99, Sweden . * "Education & Home Learning" at the International EMMA Awards in Amsterdam. == References == Category:1998 video games Category:Adventure games Category:Educational video games Category:Europe-exclusive video games Category:Mac OS games Category:Video games developed in Norway Category:Windows games
title: The A-Files (video game)
